titles: Historicall relations of the United Provinces & of Flanders written originally in Italian by Cardinall Bentivoglio ; and now rendred into English by the Right Honourable Henry, Earle of Monmouth.
author: Bentivoglio, Guido, 1577-1644.
Monmouth, Henry Carey, Earl of, 1596-1661.
publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Princeton University Library.
